title: varadharaaja mupaasmahE
sahitya:
varadarAja mupAsmahE vanajAsanAdi pUjitam



anupallavi



muraLIdharam shObhAkaram murakharAdi duSTaharam



caraNam



nIlamEgha jita sharIram niratishayAnandakaram 

kAHncI nagara vihAram kALI rakSita cOram 



madhyama kaalam



kali dOSahara tIrtha prabhAva guruguhAdi natam

kapila shukAdi sannuta garuDavAhArOhitam
